statement: That team is going to be tough to beat.
I hope they score another point!
He scored three goals during the game!
Sometimes the moon looks round and white.
I like to sit close to my friends in the classroom.
The moon has many craters on its surface.
The moon's shape looks different every night.
Mom bakes fresh bread every Sunday morning.
The seal swam playfully in the blue ocean.
She wore a red hood to keep her head warm.
My new winter boot keeps my foot dry in the snow.
